product_name: Dynaflex Blue Gyro PowerBall Hand Exerciser + Docking Station
long_description: The Dynaflex Blue Gyro PowerBall Hand Exerciser + Docking Station spins at up to 15,000 RPM with up to 40 lbs. of torque to help improve your coordination while building the strength of your grip.
short_description: The Dynaflex Blue Gyro PowerBall Hand Exerciser + Docking Station spins at up to 15,000 RPM with up to 40 lbs. of torque to help improve your coordination while building the strength of your grip.
